text: “Ndipo Ayuda ndi Akhrisitu akunena: “Ife ndife ana a Mulungu ndiponso okondeka ake.” Nena: (Iwe Mtumiki) “Nchifukwa ninji Allah amakukhaulitsani kamba ka machimo anu? Koma inu ndinu anthu chabe mwa omwe adawalenga. Amamkhululukira amene wamfuna; ndipo amamulanga amene wamfuna. Ufumu wa kumwamba ndi pansi ndi za pakati pake ngwa Allah. Ndipo kwa Iye nkobwerera.”
